meanings.definition: The middle part of a stream or river.
meanings.sent1: The fish swam peacefully in the midstreams.
meanings.sent2: The canoe gently floated through the midstreams of the river.
meanings.sent3: The ducks played a game of tag in the midstreams.
meanings.sent4: The midstreams of the river carried secrets from one end to the other.
meanings.sent5: The midstreams sparkled under the midday sun.

meanings.definition: In the middle of a stream or river.
meanings.sent1: The boat docked midstreams for a quick break.
meanings.sent2: The children splashed happily midstreams on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent3: The picnic blanket was placed midstreams for the best view.
meanings.sent4: The heron stood gracefully midstreams, waiting for its prey.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed vibrantly midstreams, adding color to the water.
